abstract: Pfizer is looking to conclude deals in emerging markets over “few months” to raise its share in a market estimated at $80 billion, a Pfizer executive told Reuters.
snippet: Pfizer is looking to conclude deals in emerging markets over “few months” to raise its share in a market estimated at $80 billion, a Pfizer executive told Reuters.
lead_paragraph: Pfizer, the world’s largest drugmaker, is looking to conclude deals in emerging markets over “few months” to raise its share of a market estimated at about $80 billion, an executive told Reuters.

headline.main: Pfizer Looks to Raise Presence in Emerging Markets
